settings.title: Our story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to explain your processes...

settings.title: Want $25 Off Your Order?
settings.content:
Just spend over $149 and we'll apply your discount at checkout.

Offer valid with FREE SHIPPING!

settings.title: RICHER BY THE DAY
settings.subheading: ENTER FOR A CHANCE TO WIN

settings.title: What carriers and service options are available?
settings.answer: We have two popular shipping services on tap with FedEx and USPS. We default to FedEx Ground and normal priority. If your order needed a custom solution or was especially large, we can route your order via freight forwarder.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer:
It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

*Orders Shipped via USPS: While we’ve returned to normal business operations, one of our carriers United States Postal Service, remains impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic. USPS has recently stated that there could be additional delays for packages. Should you continue your order with USPS, please note that it may take longer than expected to arrive. Thank you for your patience

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Orders shipped to countries outside of the United States could be subject to import taxes and customs duties charged by the destination country. Customs policies are different from country to country and as such, we advise contacting your local customs office for further information. For more information, please view our  Shipping Policies.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
Our return and refund policy lasts up to 30 days from the date of purchase. If 30 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately, we can’t offer you a refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging. Please return the unopened item(s) to the address below:

5% Nutrition
ATTN: RETURNS
8285 Bryan Dairy Rd
Suite 190
Largo, FL 33777

Please be sure to include a brief note within your package, stating the reason for the exchange/return and describing any pertinent info about the exchange/return (i.e. Return for size X, return for full refund, etc.), order number, full name and email address. 

For more information, please view our Return Policy.

settings.title: I don’t have any tracking information for my package, what should I do?
settings.answer:
We do our best ship all the same day they are ordered. Most orders are shipped by noon the next day. Some items may take up to 2 business days to ship. If you order was placed on a Friday please note this time will not include the weekend, as our staff do not work weekends at this time. 

We are open Monday to through Friday orders from 8am to 5pm EST and are closed on all major holidays.

settings.title: How can I access my past orders?
settings.answer: If you've placed an order with us, rest assured, we still have the information in our back-office systems. However, for the safety and security of our customers, we elected NOT to import past order data into our new ecommerce system. If you placed an order with us on or before February 15, 2019 please contact customer service or ping us using the live chat.

settings.title: Do you offer any payment plan options?
settings.answer: Yes, we've partnered with Sezzle to process orders into 4 easy payments. Learn more about Sezzle payments.

settings.title: I received a damaged or incorrect product, what should I do?
settings.answer: Please send a picture of the packing slip and the products you received to customerservice@5percentnutrition.com with your order number and name in the email. As soon as we receive this information, we will go over the options we have available with you.

settings.title: My Package says it was delivered but I have not received it, what should I do?
settings.answer:
Please send a message to customerservice@5percentnutrition.com with your name, and order number. If you are able, please answer the following questions within the email, as it will make the process of us talking to the carrier more efficient.

• Did you check with your neighbors to see if one of them accidentally received your package?
• Is there another street with a similar name to yours within a 3 to 5 block radius?
• Was there someone at home at the above time who may (or may not) have heard the delivery person?
• Would it be okay if the carrier contacted you regarding this issue over the phone? If so, can you please provide me with the best number to contact you at?

settings.title: Where do I find the dose and usage instructions?
settings.answer: We have added new instructions and content to our latest version of the website. Navigate to the product page that you're interested in learning more about and scroll down to the FAQs section.

settings.title: Do we still offer meal plan services?
settings.answer: Unfortunately, we have discontinued this program.

settings.title: What happened to the Real Foods bars?
settings.answer: All Real Food bars and related products have been discontinued.

settings.title: Do you still make the Egg White Crystals?
settings.answer: We do apologize. We no longer offer the Egg White Crystals product. We did release a new product, Real Carbs + Protein, which uses similar ingredients but in combination of the Real Carbs supplement. The product is currently available for purchase online here.

settings.title: My Kill It Reloaded is clumpy, is it safe to use?
settings.answer: Due to the ingredients used to promote muscle pump and vascularity, this product can sometimes clump when stored even if the seal is unbroken. This does not reduce the effectiveness of the product and does not indicate a defect. To reduce the clumping, simply tap the edge of the product bottle on a hard surface, 4 to 6 times and shake vigorously for 10 seconds. This should eliminate the clumping.

settings.title: My product has a Prop 65 warning on it, what does that mean?
settings.answer:
California's Proposition 65 requires businesses to provide warnings to Californians about exposures to chemicals that can cause cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm. Lead is widely found in nature and due to the botanical ingredients found in the product, trace amounts of lead have been absorbed from the soil.

https://www.p65warnings.ca.gov/fact-sheets/lead-and-lead-compounds

We test all of our products for heavy metals and reject any product that exceeds the USP limits for heavy metals.

settings.title: I purchased a gift card and haven’t received it in the mail yet, can you help me?
settings.answer: Your gift card was sent digitally, to your email address, if you are having issues locating the gift card in your email, please reach out to customerservice@5percentnutrition.com with the order number and name on the order.

settings.title: What is the difference between Kill It, Kill It Reloaded, 5150 and Full As F*ck?
settings.answer: Kill It is an effective pre-workout with less caffeine making it ideal for those users looking for a lower stimulant experience as well as users that are using a pre-workout for the first time. Kill It Reloaded is a complete pre-workout with a higher caffeine content, making it ideal for users with more experience using a pre-workout. 5150 is a balls-to-the-wall high stim pre-workout that is designed for hardcore users seeking the ultimate stimulant experience. Full As F*ck is our mega dosed, stim-free pump formula that’s ideal for users that do not want stims as well as those users that are cycling pre-workouts and want a break from the stim-based products.

settings.title: Where do I join the ambassador program?
settings.answer: Learn more about the program and register today, it's free!

settings.title: I'm already an ambassador, how can I login?
settings.answer: Please access the ambassador dashboard.

settings.title: What are your hours of operation?
settings.answer: We are open Monday through Friday from 9:00am to 5:00pm EST. Our live chat is available from 9:00am to 4:30pm EST to handle your inquiries. We are closed on major holidays and over the weekend.

settings.title: Do you offer a military or first responder discount program?
settings.answer:
Yes, we do! Just visit www.5percentnutrition.com/pages/military to confirm your active duty status.

Should you have questions or discount questions in in the future, you’re welcome to start a live chat or call during normal business hours.

settings.title: Is your website accessible for visually impaired visitors?
settings.answer:
We are committed to making our website as accessible as possible to people with special needs, including those with visual, hearing, cognitive and motor impairments. We're constantly working towards improving the accessibility of our website to ensure we provide equal access to all of our users.

Click to view full accessibility statement.

settings.title: Where can I inquire about becoming a retailer of 5% Nutrition?
settings.answer: You can visit the Wholesale Inquiries page and complete the form.

settings.title: What happened to PayPal Express Checkout?
settings.answer:
Due to recent changes in PayPal Terms of Services, we are temporarily suspending our use of PayPal as a payment provider. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause our customers.

While we resolve this issue and to improve your shopping experience, we have elected to remove PayPal from the express checkout options. All orders placed before August 13, 2019 using PayPal will be honored.

If you have any questions, please contact our customer service department.

settings.title: What happened to Rich-Piana.com?
settings.answer: It's still very much our site. However, it's now been consolidated in the 5% family. We migrated systems beginning February 15, 2019 to a new ecommerce platform with goal of giving our customers the best possible shopping experience. While we feel the site is an overall upgrade, we realize it will take a minute for everyone to get used to the changes. We apologize for these in advance and will make every effort to help you transition to the new site.

settings.title: Still have a question for us?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact us page and we'll be happy to assist you.

settings.title: A product I want is out of stock, is there a way I can be notified when it comes back in stock?
settings.answer:
You can set up an email notification following these steps: 
1. Go to the product page (www.5percentnutrition.com -> Search for desired product and click)
2. Click on the red Sold Out! button 
3. Enter your email address and hit submit
4. All set! As soon as we check the product into inventory, you will receive an email!

settings.title: Chris "Kable" Martinez
settings.content:
• U.S. Army Veteran
• 19 Year Police Veteran
• SWAT Team Member

• Personal Trainer
• NPC Mens Physique & GBO Beach Body Competitor
